name: BotCrash
description:
BotCrash is a small 2-4 player local multiplayer versus game, where robots use their energy beams to grab nearby junk and throw it at other players in order to send them to their demise. Pick from a selection of abilities to temporarily augment yourself or alter the arena. Lose all 5 lives and you lose, whoever remains wins!

BotCrash was developed solo over 11 months from May 2014 onward.

Supports up to two players on keyboard and up to four players in total using Xbox 360 or Xbox One controllers.

Controls

WASD/IJKL/Left Thumbstick - Move

QE/UO/Right Thumbstick - Rotate Energy Beam

F/:/Right Trigger - Pick Up/Throw Object

R/P/Left Trigger - Use Ability

Enter/Start - Pause
